stadium.name: The Glowstone Terrace
stadium.description: A massive, opulent stadium built on one of the city's main terraces, carved directly into the mountainside. The field is famously paved with polished Glowstone, and the stands overlook the bustling Confluence Market and the ongoing construction of the Guild's Skyport.

stats.pregame_ritual: Doing a terrible, clumsy dance to 'loosen the joints'.
Chugging a raw egg, shell and all.
Wearing their boots on the wrong feet during the warm-up.
Arm-wrestling the player who plays the same position on their team.
Speaking only in rhymes for the hour before the game.
Rubbing the Trollball on their armpits for 'grip'.
Wearing their boots on the wrong feet during the warm-up.
Going over the game plan drawn in the dirt with the team captain.
Covering their forearms in a sticky tree sap for 'grip'.
Eating a dandelion, stem and all.
Headbutting their own team's goal post (gently).

stadium.name: The Unruly Yard
stadium.description: A field in the center of the city's most rebellious district. The stadium is covered in graffiti, the crowd is hostile, and riots are a common post-game (and mid-game) event.

stats.pregame_ritual: Drinking a shot of hot gravy from a dented tin cup.
Arranging their gear in a perfect, aesthetically pleasing spiral.
Testing the heft of their weapon with a series of slow, deliberate swings.
Kissing the Trollball on its stitched 'nose'.
Reviewing hand signals for secret plays.
Refusing to step on any lines on the field before the whistle blows.
Telling a terrible joke to the Trollball to 'loosen it up'.
Dipping their hands in a bucket of ice-cold well water.
Slapping their own helmet until their ears ring.
Singing a sea shanty completely out of tune.
Reciting a short, epic poem about a past victory.
Arranging their gear in a perfect, aesthetically pleasing spiral.
Reviewing hand signals for secret plays.
Refusing to step on any lines on the field before the whistle blows.

preGame:
# üéôÔ∏è WELCOME TO THE GLOWSTONE TERRACE! üéôÔ∏è

Greetings, you bloodthirsty maniacs! This is Nok the Corrupter, coming to you **LIVE** from the World's Spine Mountains! We are at the Glowstone Terrace, a stadium so opulent, so shiny, and so nauseatingly polished that I can see my own handsome, demonic reflection in the floor! It is Week 4 of Tuesday Night Trollball, and the air is thin, cold, and smells distinctively of impending medical bills! üèîÔ∏è

Tonight, we have a clash that promises to stain these pristine floors red! In the home corner, representing the Guild of the Black Sky‚Äîthose penny-pinching bureaucrats who somehow learned to swing a mace‚Äîit's **The Confluence Captains**! I was peeking in their locker room earlier, and folks, these people are strange. I saw **Ladew Evelina** chugging a raw egg‚Äîshell and all! ü•ö Crunchy! And **Carnahan Laud** was eating a dandelion? Stem included? Is that a Guild delicacy or just a cry for help? Either way, I hope it gives them the energy to break some bones!

And their opponents, visiting from the riot-filled streets of the Unruly Yard, it's **The New Monteforte Chaos Creatures**! Now, *that* is a name that warms my dark, shriveled heart! üî• They might be affiliated with the White Ravens‚Äîhello Dame Terra, you dirt wizard‚Äîbut I respect their style. Their Healer, **Lian Denton**, was prepping by drinking a shot of hot gravy from a dented tin cup! That is the breakfast of champions! And look at **Fogel Raynold** over there, slapping their own helmet until their ears ring! That's the kind of brain damage I like to see *before* the whistle blows! The crowd is rowdy, the weapons are drawn, and I am giddy with anticipation! LET'S PLAY TROLLBALL! ‚öîÔ∏è
postGame:
# ü©∏ CAPTAINS CRUSH THE CHAOS! ü©∏

**FINAL SCORE: Confluence Captains 4 - Chaos Creatures 2**

By the abyssal plain, what a beautiful display of violence! If you tuned in hoping to see limbs bend in directions nature never intended, you got your money's worth tonight! The Confluence Captains defended their shiny mountain turf and sent the Chaos Creatures packing back to Monteforte with nothing but bruises and a loss! üìâ

 The game started with a bang! **Carnahan Laud** wasted no time, launching a shot from Center Field to put the Captains up 2-0! But forget the points, let's talk about the PAIN! ü§ï **Richia Pazit** absolutely demolished Urata Oriana early on‚ÄîI heard the snap from up here! Then **O'Conner Maighdlin**, who had been speaking in rhymes all pre-game, decided to write a poem of pain on Placido Kora's face! CRUNCH! üí•

But the Chaos Creatures didn't just roll over! **Mouldon Earl** took exception to the Guild's aggression and smashed Richia Pazit into the ground! An eye for an eye, a tibia for a tibia! **Gabriele Klehm** managed to find a gap in the carnage to fire a shot from Home Field, tying the game at 2-2 just before the half! A glimmer of hope for the visitors! ‚ú®

However, the second half was a clinic in brutality put on by Confluence. **Fogel Raynold** tried to keep the Chaos alive by injuring Stephan Lisk, but the Captains hit back harder! **Caves Cestar** turned Wolbrom Ariella into a fine paste, and **Carnahan Laud**‚Äîthe dandelion eater!‚Äîsent Alben Diantha to the shadow realm with a nasty tackle! üöë The healers were working overtime tonight, folks!

Amidst the flying bodies, **Behl Berstine** found the Trollball and launched a rocket from Center Field! **SCORES!** That put the Captains up 4-2! The Chaos Creatures tried to rally, with **Tucker Hett** making some desperate runs, but the defense held strong (mostly by bludgeoning anyone who came near). üõ°Ô∏è

So, the Guild takes the W! I'm sure Chairman Garon Ironrock is celebrating by sensually caressing a mahogany door right now. As for the New Monteforte Chaos Creatures? They brought the Chaos, but they forgot the points! Better luck next week, you beautiful disasters! Until then, keep your weapons sharp and your alibis ready! This is Nok the Corrupter, signing off! üëãüòà
